data.eml:eml: Description of the new solifuge Gylippus (Paragylippus) hakkaricus sp. n. (Gylippidae, Solifugae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Erdek, Melek (2019): Description of the new solifuge Gylippus (Paragylippus) hakkaricus sp. n. (Gylippidae, Solifugae). Zootaxa 4695 (6): 559-567, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4695.6.6
